mapper.update: update TTS_TEMP_XSJL_V2 set PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_INDUSTRY = #{productIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_SORT = #{productSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PC = #{productPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_AMOUNT = #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FROMZSM = #{fromzsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_COM_USER_ID = #{buyComUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_AMOUNT = #{productAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORE_COUNT = #{storeCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FREEZE_COUNT = #{freezeCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJCHECK = #{zjcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_ENTITY = #{sourceEntity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID , PRODUCT_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_INDUSTRY , PRODUCT_SORT , PRODUCT_PC , SALE_AMOUNT , BUY_COM_USER_ID , PRODUCT_AMOUNT , STORE_COUNT , FREEZE_COUNT , DEL_FLAG , FROMZSM , ZJCHECK , UNIT_ID , MEDI_CHECK , MEDI_RESULT , SHORT_CODE , PROOF_NUMBER , FROM_SHORT_CODE , TO_SHORT_CODE , SOURCE_ENTITY from TTS_TEMP_XSJL_V2 where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
